data.name: Sticky Steve's Sticky Situation
data.detailed_description:
Our friend Steve here, has found himself in a bit of a sticky situation, stuck at the bottom of a rather elaborate pit. He's going to need your guidance to get back out, but it's going to be tricky.

Sticky Steve's Sticky Situation is a difficult platformer with the simple goal of getting up out of the pit you find yourself in. However, you must first master the route and every jump as a single failure will result in starting over, or if you're lucky, just a long way back.

Steve's a sticky chap, so use this to aid your climb by sticking to any safe surface, along with his ability to boost mid jump to help reach those far jumps or correct an otherwise poor one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: 1.5GHz +
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
